CustomField.description: Cross-object formula field that displays the information whether the Work Type of the Work Order requires a "Service Restore" before the mobile field crew is allowed to complete the job. This is validated in the Field Service Mobile App in the "Update Job Status" Flow.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Inficates whether the Work Type of this Work Order requires a "Service Restore" before the mobile field crew is allowed to complete the job.
CustomField.label: Service Restore Required
